forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 53F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to a steadier rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning will give way to a steady rain in the afternoon. It will be rather windy as well. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 40F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
